text: وَأَنزَلْنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءًۢ بِقَدَرٍ فَأَسْكَنَّـٰهُ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ وَإِنَّا عَلَىٰ ذَهَابٍۭ بِهِۦ لَقَـٰدِرُونَ

translation.en.sahih: And We have sent down rain from the sky in a measured amount and settled it in the earth. And indeed, We are Able to take it away.
translation.id.indonesian: Dan Kami turunkan air dari langit menurut suatu ukuran; lalu Kami jadikan air itu menetap di bumi, dan sesungguhnya Kami benar-benar berkuasa menghilangkannya.
